alert.note: Alert for East Wind River Mountains, South Shoshone NF (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 07 at 1:30AM MDT until September 08 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT THURSDAY... The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM MDT Thursday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * IMPACTS: Low Humidities...Unseasonably Warm Temperatures... Strong Gusty Winds will create erratic fire behavior with any existing or new fire starts. * AFFECTED AREA: In Central WY...Fire Weather Zone 288. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central WY...Fremont. In West Central WY...Sublette. * WIND: West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * HUMIDITY: As low as 15 percent. * TEMPERATURES: Highs in the mid 70s.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: East Wind River Mountains, South Shoshone NF
